summary: This is my first house mod for you and 20 other followers to enjoy outside of Whiterun. The location has already been added to the map. you can install this at the beginning of the game or at any point you wish but the letter outside the front of the house would make more sense if it was done from the start
descriptionHtml:
My Mod is also available on Special Edition

Version 3 is here for everyone to enjoy i have changed the inside and outside of the mod to make it look more homely, the features in the old versions are still there, plus bigger fish tank and more stable than it previously was. I have tried my best to improve this mod as much as i can with the limited time i have. Please enjoy the mod also the old version will still be available if the update is not to your taste.

Warning : if you have already the previous version of the mod please take your gear out of the chests to make sure you don't lose your gear or items.

location: map marker is located next to whiterun stables instantly fast travel to the location

what this mod contains:
20+ (including the player double bed)
A Bigger fish tank
A fireplace on each floor
statues within the house for followers to worship
benches and tables for followers to use outside
a forge in the back of the house and other crafting components
a foot pool is now a shower area for followers to enjoy

known issues:
I cant assign followers to the house so I suggest using my home is your home to assign 10 followers on each floor so that they can use the stuff within the house
dragon bones might land on the back porch to solve this if they do not disappear use the console command in first person select the dragon remains disable then save and load and the dragon remains should leave.

improvements that may be needed:
followers remove clothes when entering the pool and when sleeping in the beds - if anyone knows how to do this then any help would be most appreciated.

installation:
1. download with nexus mod and manager and press install and your ready to go.

removal:
1. click un install from the nexus mod manager and the mod is now removed.
author: Dustierapple
